D.description:
Unit of distance in Synegier.
The distance between two points measured along axes at right angles.
Synegier often use 'within' and D together. This is unit of range. For example, 'within 2D' is within 2D from where you are now.

Shock.description:
(Debuff) Unable to move while attaching Shock.
When you play a card, the value of Shock is decrease by the maximum number of D the card can move.

Fear.description: (Debuff) If you have Fear(X), the number of card is -X when next draw.
